title: #071 - Exactly How I Manage my Time & Stay Productive as a Small Business Owner
itunes:title: #071 - Exactly How I Manage my Time & Stay Productive as a Small Business Owner
description: In this Episode of On Purpose With Alex Beadon I’ll be sharing exactly how I manage my time & stay productive as a small business owner. This episode contains every single thing I wish I knew about time management and productivity when I first got started. I share mindsets you must adopt if you want to truly maximize your time, I share exactly how you should be using your calendar on a daily basis to find more time in your day. I share the book that changed the way I prioritize my tasks, the online course that revolutionized how I manage my tasks, and the apps I use on a daily basis and why you should be using them too. These mindsets, apps, and systems have completely changed my life and I hope they do the same for you.
